definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: This will activate your parasympathetic nervous system which will calm you down and slow your heart rate.
sentences.chinese: 這樣能激活副交感神經，有助於安神和降低心率。

sentences.english: Even though it may not be easily determinable , the level of sympathetic blockade is important.
sentences.chinese: 儘管交感神經的阻滯平面不易確定但非常重要。

sentences.english: The conscious mind is complicit in it, but a lot of sexual arousal goes on in the sympathetic nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 顯意識與此相關，但許多性喚起受交感神經系統控制。

sentences.english: The penis is "kind of a barometer of the sympathetic nervous system," Montague says.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔古說小弟弟是“某種交感神經系統睛雨表”。
副交感神經系統使身體放鬆。

sentences.english: Objective To study the method of puncture for radiofrequency ablation of lumbar sympathetic ganglion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腰交感神經節射頻消融術的進針方法。

sentences.english: For example, they have high blood pressure, high plasma catecholamines, and high sympathetic nerve activity.
sentences.chinese: 例如高血壓，高血漿兒茶酚胺和高交感神經活性等。

sentences.english: Conclusion Radiofrequency ablation can effectively block lumbar sympathetic ganglion.
sentences.chinese: 結論射頻熱凝術能有效地毀損腰交感神經節。

sentences.english: Conclusions Endoscopic thoracic sympathectomy is simple and safe, procedure.
sentences.chinese: 結論內鏡下胸交感神經鏈切斷術比較安全。

sentences.english: To determine sensory pathways, bilateral sympathectomy was performed.
sentences.chinese: 應用雙側交感神經切除術來檢測感覺通路。

sentences.english: However, there are suspicions that sildenafil may cause sympathetic activation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有人懷疑西地那非可能引起交感神經激活。

sentences.english: The sympathetic nerve distributing cerebral vessels originates from the cervical sympathetic ganglia .
sentences.chinese: 支配腦血管的交感神經起源於頸交感神經節。

sentences.english: The sympathetic nerve distributing cerebral vessels originates from the cervical sympathetic ganglia .
sentences.chinese: 支配腦血管的交感神經起源於頸交感神經節。

sentences.english: The higher type of the deformity, the more decrease of the SPN neurons.
sentences.chinese: 畸形位置愈高，副交感神經元數量降低愈明顯。

sentences.english: HRP labelled cells in the lumbar sympathetic ganglions were to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 在腰交感神經節內尋找HRP標記細胞。

sentences.english: C. Presacral neurectomy refers to interruption of the sympathetic innervation of the uterus.
sentences.chinese: 骶前神經切除術指切斷支配子宮的交感神經。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
